name: Submarine Simulator (itch) (turtletennis, Ouroboros, blubberbaleen)
description:
NOW WITH WebGL!
RMB   Right click the screen to enter "Steering mode"

To aim the ship put the cursor on one edge of the screen and it will slowly turn that direction.

Q/E   Lowers and raises your submarine

W/S   Moves your submarine forwards and backwards

A/D   Strafe your submarine from side to side

SPACE  Toggles Sonar which pings when you're close to treasure

L   Toggles the headlights

Explore and hunt for treasure in our exotic open word. Use the submarines sensitive control's to delicately navigate through the tight terrain of our map. Weather you're frolicking in the glowing mushroom forest, or bumping your way through the dark underground geyser cave, there's something beautiful to see.

We had to cut a lot to get the game playable in browser, so if you liked it and want a bit more feel free to download it. 

Thanks for playing everyone! 


--

Created for the Jamulator Game Jam, Apr 2021, by TreasureBerries (programmer), Sid (programmer), turtletennis (artist), Doltonm3D (artist) and blubberbaleen (sound).
